newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products mainly lower, gasoline steady.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products mainly lower, gasoline steady.

text.p: NWE oil products were mostly weaker on Wednesday but gasoline was firm.
Gasoline Eurograde barges trading late at $228 fob ARA, up $1 after bullish U.S. inventory data.
Naphtha was slightly weaker with Nov swaps off 50 cents at $222 in quiet trading.
High sulphur cracked fuel oil was softer with barges trading at $118 fob ARA and cargo offers at $119 cif NWE.
Gas oil tumbled in sympathy with underlying futures while lower demand and better supply depressed diesel barge premiums. Heating oil premiums were steady.
